com.citytechinc.aem.bedrock.api.request

Interface ComponentServletRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentResourceRequest
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComponentRequest

    public interface ComponentServletRequest
extends ComponentResourceRequest
    Request facade for use in CQ servlets and component beans.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<String> getRequestParameter(String parameterName)
      Retrieve a parameter from the request or return an absent Optional if it does not exist.
      String getRequestParameter(String parameterName, String defaultValue)
      Retrieve a parameter value from the request or return a default value if the parameter does not exist.
      Optional<List<String>> getRequestParameters(String parameterName)
      Retrieve parameters from the request or return an absent Optional if they do not exist.
      List<String> getSelectors() 
      SlingHttpServletRequest getSlingRequest() 
      SlingHttpServletResponse getSlingResponse() 
      WCMMode getWCMMode() 

      • Methods inherited from interface com.citytechinc.aem.bedrock.api.request.ComponentResourceRequest

        getComponentNode, getCurrentNode, getCurrentPage, getPageManager, getPageProperties, getProperties, getResource, getResourceResolver, getSession

    • Method Detail

      • getRequestParameter

        Optional<String> getRequestParameter(String parameterName)
        Retrieve a parameter from the request or return an absent Optional if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        parameterName - request parameter name
        Returns:
        Optional parameter value

      • getRequestParameters

        Optional<List<String>> getRequestParameters(String parameterName)
        Retrieve parameters from the request or return an absent Optional if they do not exist.
        Parameters:
        parameterName - request parameter name
        Returns:
        Optional parameter values

      • getRequestParameter

        String getRequestParameter(String parameterName,
                         String defaultValue)
        Retrieve a parameter value from the request or return a default value if the parameter does not exist. If the parameter does not exist and the default value is null, the empty string is returned.
        Parameters:
        parameterName - request parameter name
        defaultValue - String of the default value to return if the parameter does not exist.
        Returns:
        String of the parameter or the default value if it doesn't exist. If the default value is null, return the empty string.

      • getSelectors

        List<String> getSelectors()
        Returns:
        Sling request selectors or empty array if the request has no selectors

      • getSlingRequest

        SlingHttpServletRequest getSlingRequest()
        Returns:
        Sling servlet request

      • getSlingResponse

        SlingHttpServletResponse getSlingResponse()
        Returns:
        Sling servlet response

      • getWCMMode

        WCMMode getWCMMode()
        Returns:
        current WCM mode for this request
